notifications.notLoggedIn: You are not logged in. Progress will not be tracked. Practice recommendations and personalized exercises are not possible.
notifications.notOnline: You seem to have lost your internet connection. Some functionalities will not be available until you are back online.

errorNote: <par>Oops ... something went wrong. {reason}</par><par>It could be that an old version of this app is still present on your device. Try a hard refresh (shift+F5) to see if this solves the problem.</par><par>Is the bug still there? If so, please send an email to <link>{infoEmail}</link> (Hildo). Then I will fix the bug, so that both you and others won't continue running into it. If possible, also add:</par><list><item>Where the bug occurred: which skill/exercise.</item><item>What you did right before the bug appeared.</item><item>Possibly a screenshot of the red error message in the Developer's Tools console (F12).</item></list>
